panels.description: This panel displays detail of total number of FC-NVMe/FCP operations and amount of FC-NVMe/FCP traffic to and from the storage system.
panels.title: FC Throughput

panels.description: This panel displays detail of number of FC-NVMe/FC read operations and amount of data read from the storage system (FC-NVMe/FC).
panels.title: FC Read Throughput

panels.description: This panel displays detail of Number of FC-NVMe/FC write operations and amount of data written to the storage system (FC-NVMe/FC).
panels.title: FC Write Throughput

panels.description: Displays a collection of ports (physical, VLAN and LAG) for an entire cluster.
panels.title: Ethernet ports

panels.description: This table tracks hardware network traffic performance and errors for all supported network interface cards (NIC), such as Intel Niantic, Qlogic, and CNA.
panels.title: NIC ports

panels.description: Summarized on Cluster or Node level. Select Eth to show for a specific Ethernet Port.
panels.title: NICs Send Errors by Cluster

panels.description: Summarized on Cluster or Node level. Select Eth to show for a specific Ethernet Port.
panels.title: NICs Receive Errors by Cluster

panels.description: Detail of interface group, also known as a Link Aggregation Group (LAG), created by combining two or more physical ports on the same node into a single logical port.
panels.title: Link Aggregation Groups

options.content:
This panel requires ONTAP 9.6+ and the APIs are only available via REST. Enable the REST collector in your `harvest.yml` config.
See https://github.com/NetApp/harvest/wiki/Troubleshooting-Harvest#why-do-i-have-fc-ports-with-fabric-detail-table-empty-in-network-dashboard for more details.

panels.description: Amount of data read from the storage system.
panels.title: Top $TopResources FCPs by Send Throughput

panels.description: Amount of data written to the storage system.
panels.title: Top $TopResources FCPs by Receive Throughput

panels.description: Summarized on Cluster or Node level. Select FCP to show for a specific FibreChannel Port.
panels.title: FCPs Transmission interrupts

panels.description: Summarized on Cluster or Node level. Select FCP to show for a specific FibreChannel Port.
panels.title: FCPs Transmission errors

panels.description: Number of times the Fibre Channel link was lost.
panels.title: Top $TopResources FCPs by Link Down

panels.description: Amount of data read from the storage system (FC-NVMe).
panels.title: Top $TopResources FCP_NVMFs by Send Throughput

panels.description: Amount of data written to the storage system (FC-NVMe).
panels.title: Top $TopResources FCP_NVMFs by Receive Throughput

options.content: This panel requires a cluster with ONTAP 9.6+ and the Harvest REST collector
